alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:42AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz County through 1130 AM MST... At 1042 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Wenden, or 20 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wenden. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 64 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
